name: Raymond Joseph Brousseau
part_bio: Beloved husband of the late Marie Gabrielle “Gay” (Lafreniere) Brousseau (2008). Loved brother and brother-in-law of Benoit and Madeleine Brousseau of Timmins, Rita Brousseau of North Bay, Rose Anne Brousseau of Mattice and Tom Doran of Chatham. Remembered by his nieces, nephews and the Lafreniere families. Predeceased by parents Napoleon and Diana (Thibodeau) Brousseau, sisters Marie Paul Gilbert, Mariettte Nolet, Gisele Boucher, Lorraine Doran, brothers Gaston, Jules, Paul Eugene and Claude Brousseau.
